# PED::ADD_ARMOUR_TO_PED

## Summary
Increments the peds armour

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT** armourToAdd

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Same as SET_PED_ARMOUR, but ADDS 'amount' to the armor the Ped already has.
